title: Osmo Pocket 3 Black Mist Filter
description: The Black Mist Filter adopts a magnetic design for easy mounting. It can control highlight flares and soften skin tones, giving you a unique and captivating look.

title: Osmo Pocket 3 Wide-Angle Lens
description: Attach the Wide-Angle Lens to expand the FOV to 108° and capture more in every frame. Its magnetic design allows for quick, convenient attachment and detachment.

title: Osmo Mini Tripod
description: The Mini Tripod is flexible, portable, and equipped with a 1/4″-20 screw for expansion.

title: Osmo Pocket 3 Battery Handle
description: The Battery Handle has a built-in 950mAh battery, which can increase the operating time by approximately 62% when connected to Pocket 3. It supports hot swapping and comes with a USB-C port that can be used to connect external audio devices.

title: Osmo Pocket 3 Magnetic ND Filters Set
description: The Magnetic ND Filters Set includes ND16, ND64, and ND256 filters. A magnetic design facilitates easy attachment and detachment.

title: Osmo Pocket 3 Expansion Adapter
description: The Expansion Adapter can expand to fit a cold shoe and an action camera port.

title: Osmo Pocket 3 Carrying Bag
description: Designed specifically for the Creator Combo, the Carrying Bag ensures convenient storage of all your device and accessories.
